pullRequest.title: Fix #511: Namespace as resource fragment results in NullPointerException
pullRequest.bodyText:
Fix #511

DefaultNamespaceEnricher should handle case when status is not provided in resource spec.
.metadata.namespace should be omitted from Project/Namespace resources since they are Cluster scoped
UndeployService should consider Project/Namespace resource while deletion phase

Description

Type of change


 Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
 Feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
 Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to change
 Chore (non-breaking change which doesn't affect codebase;
test, version modification, documentation, etc.)

Checklist

 I have read the contributing guidelines
 I signed-off my commit with a user that has signed the Eclipse Contributor Agreement
 I Added CHANGELOG entry
 I have implemented unit tests to cover my changes
 I have updated the documentation accordingly
 No new bugs, code smells, etc. in SonarCloud report
 I tested my code in Kubernetes
 I tested my code in OpenShift

nodes.bodyText:
This test is used to verify that all applicable entities are deleted.
Previously this meant pod and service, but not namespace.
Please, add a new "not-applicable" entity to verify that it's not deleted.

afterCommit.message:
Don't Filter out Namespace while applying/deleting resources

No need to filter out Namespace/Project while apply/undeploy phase.
We can sort the Kubernetes resource list to have Namespace in the
front so that it gets created first during apply phase and deleted
last in undeploy phase
